name: No More Gold (Jam version WGJ17)
description:
Hello everyone !

Here is my participation for the Weekly Game Jam 17
https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-17

The theme was : Meltdown

How to play ?

On the title page, you have the choice between three levels of difficulty : Just press 1, 2 or 3 on your Numeric Keypad.

Use the arrow keys or the WASD keys to move the hero until the gold nugget, once you have it, go back to the exit,

press Spacebar down to speed up,

you can also give a shot and destroy the rocks if you press the spacebar.

As usual, i made it all alone, from graphics to music and sound.

I hope you'll enjoy play this game, and don't forget to leave me any comments if you want :-)
